children.value:
String is a sequence of characters. Any sequence or set of characters defined within double quotation
symbols is a constant string. The string exercise program list has been given bellow. All the programs have
been solved in three programming languages are C, C++ and Java. Start your journey with C, C++ and Java
programming with the string program list-
String Exercise Program List
Write a program in C to input a string and print it.
Write a program in C to find the length of a string without using library function.
Write a program in C to separate the individual characters from a string.
Write a program in C to print individual characters of string in reverse order.
Write a C program to find length of a string.
Write a C program to copy one string to another string.
Write a C program to concatenate two strings.
Write a C program to compare two strings.
Write a C program to convert lowercase string to uppercase.
Write a C program to convert uppercase string to lowercase.
Write a C program to toggle case of each character of a string.
Write a C program to find total number of alphabets, digits or special character in a string.
Write a C program to count total number of vowels and consonants in a string.
Write a C program to count total number of words in a string.
Write a C program to find reverse of a string.
Write a C program to check whether a string is palindrome or not.
Write a program in C to find maximum occurring character in a string.
Write a C program to sort a string array in ascending order.
Write a C program to sort a string array in descending order.
Write a program in C to extract a substring from a given string.
Write a C program to check whether a given substring is present in the given string.
Write a program in C to remove characters in String Except Alphabets.
Write a program in C to read a file and remove the spaces between two words of its content.
Write a program in C to check whether a character is digit or not.
Write a C programming to convert vowels into upper case character in a given string.
Write a C program to find first occurrence of a word in a given string.
Write a C program to find last occurrence of a word in a given string.
Write a C program to search all occurrences of a word in given string.
Write a C program to count occurrences of a word in a given string.
Write a C program to remove first occurrence of a word from string.
Write a C program to remove last occurrence of a word in given string.
Write a C program to remove all occurrence of a word in given string.
Write a C programming to count of each character in a given string.
Write a program to delete all vowels from a sentence. Assume that the sentence is not more than 80 characters long.
Write a program that will read a line and delete from it all occurrences of the word ‘the’.
Write a program that takes a set of names of individuals and abbreviates the first, middle and other names except the last name by their first letter.

Write a program to count the number of occurrences of any two vowels in succession in a line of text. For example, in the sentence “Pleases read this application and give me gratuity” such occurrences are ea, ea, ui

{`String is a sequence of characters. Any sequence or set of characters defined within double quotation symbols is a constant string. The string exercise program list has been given bellow. All the programs have been solved in three programming languages are C, C++ and Java. Start your journey with C, C++ and Java programming with the string program list-`}

{`String Exercise Program List`}

  1. {`Write a program in C to input a string and print it.`}
  2. {`Write a program in C to find the length of a string without using library function.`}
  3. {`Write a program in C to separate the individual characters from a string.`}
  4. {`Write a program in C to print individual characters of string in reverse order.`}
  5. {`Write a C program to find length of a string.`}
  6. {`Write a C program to copy one string to another string.`}
  7. {`Write a C program to concatenate two strings.`}
  8. {` Write a C program to compare two strings.`}
  9. {`Write a C program to convert lowercase string to uppercase.`}
  10. {`Write a C program to convert uppercase string to lowercase.`}
  11. {`Write a C program to toggle case of each character of a string.`}
  12. {`Write a C program to find total number of alphabets, digits or special character in a string.`}
  13. {`Write a C program to count total number of vowels and consonants in a string.`}
  14. {`Write a C program to count total number of words in a string.`}
  15. {`Write a C program to find reverse of a string.`}
  16. {`Write a C program to check whether a string is palindrome or not.`}
  17. {`Write a program in C to find maximum occurring character in a string.`}
  18. {`Write a C program to sort a string array in ascending order.`}
  19. {`Write a C program to sort a string array in descending order.`}
  20. {`Write a program in C to extract a substring from a given string.`}
  21. {`Write a C program to check whether a given substring is present in the given string.`}
  22. {`Write a program in C to remove characters in String Except Alphabets.`}
  23. {`Write a program in C to read a file and remove the spaces between two words of its content.`}
  24. {`Write a program in C to check whether a character is digit or not.`}
  25. {`Write a C programming to convert vowels into upper case character in a given string.`}
  26. {`Write a C program to find first occurrence of a word in a given string.`}
  27. {`Write a C program to find last occurrence of a word in a given string.`}
  28. {`Write a C program to search all occurrences of a word in given string.`}
  29. {`Write a C program to count occurrences of a word in a given string.`}
  30. {`Write a C program to remove first occurrence of a word from string.`}
  31. {`Write a C program to remove last occurrence of a word in given string.`}
  32. {`Write a C program to remove all occurrence of a word in given string.`}
  33. {`Write a C programming to count of each character in a given string.`}
  34. {`Write a program to delete all vowels from a sentence. Assume that the sentence is not more than 80 characters long.`}
  35. {`Write a program that will read a line and delete from it all occurrences of the word ‘the’.`}
  36. {`Write a program that takes a set of names of individuals and abbreviates the first, middle and other names except the last name by their first letter.`}
  37. {`Write a program to count the number of occurrences of any two vowels in succession in a line of text. For example, in the sentence “Pleases read this application and give me gratuity” such occurrences are ea, ea, ui`}
